section.heading: Suspension of running of statute of limitations.

content.p: 59-1-1418. Suspension of running of statute of limitations. (1) The time period allowed for making an assessment or commencing a proceeding under Section 59-1-1410 shall be extended by the time period during which the commission is prohibited by law from making an assessment or commencing a proceeding for collection, plus 60 days. (2) The time period allowed for commencing a proceeding under Section 59-1-1410 shall be extended by the time period during which the commencement of the proceeding is stayed by injunction or statutory prohibition. Enacted by Chapter 212 , 2009 General Session

The time period allowed for making an assessment or commencing a proceeding under Section shall be extended by the time period during which the commission is prohibited by law from making an assessment or commencing a proceeding for collection, plus 60 days.

The time period allowed for commencing a proceeding under Section shall be extended by the time period during which the commencement of the proceeding is stayed by injunction or statutory prohibition.
